author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/battlefield-2042/

Welcome to the end of the world as we know it. This is the new War Machine event. You’ll need to conquer three modes and save humanity from extinction.

💎 Take back control of precious resources by holding a majority of capture points in Domination.

🔫 Take up arms against the rogue AOS AI who started this fight and wipe out her relentless horde of AI robots in Override.

💥 Fight and take charge of a single capture point as hell rains down on you – if your squad can handle the onslaught – in King of the Hill, coming April 1st.

🎁 Secure event unlockable rewards like Machines vs Humans Cosmetics with 30 tiers of an all-new Event Pass.

The world needs you, No-Pat. Does your squad have what it takes to take down the War Machine?

Play the War Machine event between Mar 18 – Apr 15.

Rated Mature

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #battlefront
title: Battlefield 2042 - War Machine Event Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
